org.apache.felix.ipojo.extender

Interface ConfigurationBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultConfigurationBuilder

    public interface ConfigurationBuilder
    Support class for fluent instance declaration building. This class can be used to provide values for instance configuration. Any object can be used as configuration values (List and Maps are accepted for example).
    Since:
    1.11.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeclarationHandle build()
      Build the declaration handle (contains the instance configuration).
      ConfigurationBuilder clear()
      Remove all properties from the configuration.
      ConfigurationBuilder property(String name, Object value)
      Provide a property value.
      ConfigurationBuilder remove(String name)
      Remove a property from the configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • property

        ConfigurationBuilder property(String name,
                            Object value)
        Provide a property value.
        Parameters:
        name - property name
        value - property value
        Returns:
        this builder

      • remove

        ConfigurationBuilder remove(String name)
        Remove a property from the configuration. This does not affect already created declarations (from this builder).
        Parameters:
        name - property name
        Returns:
        this builder

      • clear

        ConfigurationBuilder clear()
        Remove all properties from the configuration. This does not affect already created declarations (from this builder).
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        DeclarationHandle build()
        Build the declaration handle (contains the instance configuration). Notice that the declaration is not yet published (no automatic activation). The client has to do it through DeclarationHandle.publish()
        Returns:
        the handle to the configured declaration
